snippet: A senior Israeli military official said the likelihood of an invasion was “very high” as the Palestinian death toll reached 205, including four children killed on a beach.
abstract: Senior Israeli military official, speaking on condition of anonymity, indicates that ground invasion of Gaza is likely in face of Hamas's tenacity and surprisingly deep arsenal; brief cease-fire is set after Israeli airstrikes on Gaza beach kills four Palestinian children.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Anne Barnard, Fares Akram and Tyler Hicks from Gaza; Isabel Kershner from Ashkelon, Israel; and Peter Baker from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A senior Israeli military official said the likelihood of an invasion was “very high” as the Palestinian death toll reached 205, including four children killed on a beach.

headline.main: Military Official Says Israel Invasion of Gaza Is Likely
headline.print_headline: Israeli Invasion of Gaza Is Likely, Official Says; Brief Cease-Fire Is Set
